Boston.R. H. Stearns Building:
The R. H. Stearns Building is an 11-story residence building (with shops at ground level) at 140 Tremont Street in Boston. It was built in 1909 for the businessman R. H. Stearns and his company and was the home of the R. H. Stearns and Company department store until its demise in 1978.
The Stearns store had been in many locations in Boston before finally settling in its new building and headquarters at 140 Tremont Street.
